Marc Dugger wrote:

> I'm using JUnit (w/o Ant) to run a sequence of tests.  I'm adding all tests
> to a suite and calling run(TestResults) on the suite.  However, the test
> only runs until it experiences one failure.  How do I specify to run
> completely so I can collect failures from each test?  Thanks.

Please clarify:

  * The suite stops after one test fails?
  * The test stops after one assertion fails?

If it's #2, then that works as expected. See the JUnit FAQ for details.

If it's #1, that's strange. Post the code if you can.

PS: Why are you invoking run(TestResult)? Why are you not using a test 
runner? Just curious.
